meanings.definition: Four times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The family bought a quadruples pack of tickets for the amusement park.
meanings.sent2: She was amazed by the quadruples increase in her savings account.
meanings.sent3: The quadruples amount of ice cream he ate made him feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness quadruples whenever she sees a rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The quadruples number of stars in the sky on a clear night is breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A group or set of four similar things.
meanings.sent1: The quadruples of kittens played together in the yard.
meanings.sent2: She received a gift basket filled with a quadruples of different chocolates.
meanings.sent3: The quadruples of friends decided to go on a road trip together.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the player needs to collect a quadruples of keys to unlock the treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The garden had a quadruples of colorful flowers blooming in the spring.
